title: A Culinary Journey Through the South of France

outline.text: Basque, a traditional Basque cake filled with pastry cream or cherry jam.
Wine Regions and Types of Wines
Corbières, Minervois, and Picpoul de Pinet. Key grape varieties include Carignan, whites.
Vacqueyras, and Côtes du Rhône. Key grape varieties include Grenache, Syrah, and
Mourvèdre for reds, and Viognier, Marsanne, and Roussanne for whites.
